title: ISlicingData.AddSlicingPlanesAndSketchesToFolder
description: Gets or sets whether to add slicing planes and sketches to a folder in the FeatureManager design tree.
returns: True to add slicing planes and sketches to a folder in the FeatureManager design tree, false to not
remarks:
If this property is set to true, then after slicing, a
Slice1
folder is created in the FeatureManager design tree from which you can explicitly select and edit the slicing sketches and reference planes.
